video.title: World War II in Colour
video.synopsis: Footage of the most dramatic moments from World War II is restored in color and high definition for this historical documentary series.

episodes.synopsis: With the Great Depression sapping the will of Western democracies to intervene, Mussolini and Hitler are able to grab and expand their powers.
episodes.title: The Gathering Storm

episodes.synopsis: This installment shows how the Nazis developed a terrifying new military tactic called Blitzkrieg, which caught Poland, Britain and France unprepared.
episodes.title: Lightning War

episodes.synopsis: In July 1940, Hitler has victory in sight, but Britain, using its brilliant team of code crackers and specially trained spies, begins to fight back.
episodes.title: Britain at Bay

episodes.synopsis: Hitler's generals are horrified when he expresses his intention to invade Russia, leading to history's largest-scale tank battle.
episodes.title: Hitler Strikes East

episodes.synopsis: Franklin Roosevelt declares December 7, 1941, "a date which will live in infamy" after Japan's attack on Pearl Harbor forces the U.S. into the war.
episodes.title: Red Sun Rampant

episodes.synopsis: The war in North Africa, critical due to its location and oil reserves, starts well under Rommel's leadership but soon deteriorates for the Axis.
episodes.title: The Mediterranean and North Africa

episodes.synopsis: Both the Allies and the Nazis engage in a brutally deadly and protracted back-and-forth battle to strike a knockout blow that will end the war.
episodes.title: Turning the Tide

episodes.synopsis: July 1943 and Hitler's failure on the Russian front becomes clear as his forces fall mercy to the vast Soviet war machine.
episodes.title: The Soviet Steamroller

episodes.synopsis: Charting the careful, laborious planning of the campaign to invade France and the secret plan that successfully misled Hitler about the invasion site.
episodes.title: Overlord

episodes.synopsis: As Britain and Russia begin to close their pincers around Germany, the true extent of the Holocaust and its gruesome death camps is revealed.
episodes.title: Closing the Ring

episodes.synopsis: On the Pacific front, horrific conditions in island jungles and mountains slow the Allied advance against Japan to a meter-by-meter death match.
episodes.title: The Island War

episodes.synopsis: The end is in sight as British and American forces cross the Rhine while Russian troops simultaneously push through Poland and into Berlin.
episodes.title: Victory in Europe

episodes.synopsis: Believing that Japan will never surrender, the Truman administration drops atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, forcing a grim finale to the war.
episodes.title: Victory in the Pacific
